parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the runtime environment.

nested_items.name: actualCapacity
nested_items.description: The number of instances included in the runtime environment. A standalone runtime environment has a maximum of one instance. Currently, a high availability runtime environment has a maximum of two instances.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the runtime environment was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the runtime environment.

nested_items.name: engineType
nested_items.description: The target platform for the runtime environment.

nested_items.name: engineVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the runtime engine.

nested_items.name: environmentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the runtime environment.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the runtime environment.

nested_items.name: highAvailabilityConfig
nested_items.description: The desired capacity of the high availability configuration for the runtime environment.

nested_items.name: desiredCapacity
nested_items.description: The number of instances in a high availability configuration. The minimum possible value is 1 and the maximum is 100.

nested_items.name: instanceType
nested_items.description: The type of instance underlying the runtime environment.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of a customer managed key.

nested_items.name: loadBalancerArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the load balancer used with the runtime environment.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the runtime environment. Must be unique within the account.

nested_items.name: networkType
nested_items.description: The network type supported by the runtime environment.

nested_items.name: pendingMaintenance
nested_items.description: Indicates the pending maintenance scheduled on this environment.

nested_items.name: engineVersion
nested_items.description: The specific runtime engine that the maintenance schedule applies to.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The time the scheduled maintenance is to end.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The time the scheduled maintenance is to start.

nested_items.name: preferredMaintenanceWindow
nested_items.description: The maintenance window for the runtime environment. If you don't provide a value for the maintenance window, the service assigns a random value.

nested_items.name: publiclyAccessible
nested_items.description: Whether applications running in this runtime environment are publicly accessible.

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The unique identifiers of the security groups assigned to this runtime environment.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the runtime environment. If the Amazon Web Services Mainframe Modernization environment is missing a connection to the customer owned dependent resource, the status will be Unhealthy.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the reported status.

nested_items.name: storageConfigurations
nested_items.description: The storage configurations defined for the runtime environment.

nested_items.name: fileSystemId
nested_items.description: The file system identifier.

nested_items.name: mountPoint
nested_items.description: The mount point for the file system.

nested_items.name: fileSystemId
nested_items.description: The file system identifier.

nested_items.name: mountPoint
nested_items.description: The mount point for the file system.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: The unique identifiers of the subnets assigned to this runtime environment.
(string) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: vpcId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the VPC used with this runtime environment.
